The best of both worlds (means you can enjoy two different opportunities at the same time)
Speak of the devil (this means that the person you’re just talking about actually appears at that moment)
See eye to eye (this means agreeing with someone)
Once in a blue moon (an event that happens infrequently)
When pigs fly (something that will never happen)
To cost an arm and a leg (something is very expensive)
A piece of cake (something is very easy)
Let the cat out of the bag (to accidentally reveal a secret)
To feel under the weather (to not feel well)
To cut corners (to do something badly or cheaply)

[% var d = new Date(); %]
La data di oggi usando d è: [%=d%]
La data di oggi usando d.dateAsParam() è: [%=d.dateAsParam()%]
La data di oggi usando d.datetimeAsParam() è: [%=d.datetimeAsParam()%]
La data di oggi usando d.format() è: [%=d.format()%]
La data di oggi usando d.format({weekday: 'short', year: 'numeric', month: 'short', day: 'numeric'},'en') è: [%=d.format({weekday: 'short', year: 'numeric', month: 'short', day: 'numeric'},'en')%]
mesi da -5 a +5:
[%for(var i=-5;i<=5;i++){%] [% var d = new Date(); d.yesterday().yesterday(); d.changeMonth(i) %]
[%=i%] - [%=d.format({month: 'long'},'it')%]
[%}%]
calendar data: [%=JSON.stringify(new Date().calendarMonth())%]
